name: planet generator (perii)
description:
this is a planet generator with multiplayer

[how to play?]

at the start of the game you have 2 option you can *Create* {creating a game}

and *join* {joining a game} to join you need a code from a game {the one that is typed in the *Create* input field}

[the simulation lasts only 60min]

[bugs] :

planet does not have colliders

50% of planets don't match in multiplayer

timing does no match in multiplayer(just join at the same time) 

the project is still a prototype it will get better in the future
